headline: Occidental Petroleum Reshapes Portfolio After OxyChem Sale To Berkshire Hathaway
summary: Occidental Petroleum has completed the sale of its OxyChem business to Berkshire Hathaway. The company is using the transaction to restructure its balance sheet, including debt reduction. Occidental is also revising its Delaware Basin gathering contract as part of a broader portfolio reshaping. For investors watching NYSE:OXY, this marks a meaningful shift in how the company is put together. The sale of OxyChem, combined with balance sheet moves and contract changes in the Delaware Basin,...
